BundleInfo.name: ribxz_chimerax
BundleInfo.Author: rtviii
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Access and visualize ribosome metadata from remote server
BundleInfo.Description:
This bundle allows users to fetch ribosome metadata from a remote server and automatically apply visualization settings based on that data.
Commands: - ribxz loci: Visualize specific locations in ribosomes (tunnel, PTC, constriction sites) - ribxz polymers: Apply custom coloring to ribosome structures based on polymer types
